org.apache.hawq.pxf.api

Class Fragment

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.hawq.pxf.api.Fragment

  • public class Fragment
extends java.lang.Object
    Fragment holds a data fragment' information. Fragmenter.getFragments() returns a list of fragments.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Fragment

        public Fragment(java.lang.String sourceName,
                java.lang.String[] hosts,
                byte[] metadata)
        Constructs a Fragment.
        Parameters:
        sourceName - the resource uri (File path+name, table name, etc.)
        hosts - the replicas
        metadata - the meta data (Starting point + length, region location, etc.).

      • Fragment

        public Fragment(java.lang.String sourceName,
                java.lang.String[] hosts,
                byte[] metadata,
                byte[] userData)
        Constructs a Fragment.
        Parameters:
        sourceName - the resource uri (File path+name, table name, etc.)
        hosts - the replicas
        metadata - the meta data (Starting point + length, region location, etc.).
        userData - third party data added to a fragment.
